DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effectiveness of NGT (Optive) vs. Systane Tears for patients with moderate to severe dry eye disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Optive in Patients Previously Using Systane for the Treatment of Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: · Dry eye disease diagnosis Patients must currently be using Systane tears at least once a day and for at least 1 month. Normal lid position and closure Male or female of legal age of consent Informed consent has been obtained Likely to complete all required followup visits · Concurrent enrollment in an investigational drug or device study, or participation in such a study within 30 days of entry into this study. Subject has a condition, or is in a situation which, in the investigator's opinion, may put the subject at a significant risk, may confound the study results, or may interfere significantly with the subject's participation in the study.
